overview: When Marcus gets a hold of Piper, this bad spinner will do just about anything to avoid going back to jail. Marcus is on the trail of another bad girl when he spies Alexa at the gym. She leads him on a car chase, but this bounty hunter knows how to catch his prey. Alexa Nova is on the run from Preston, a bounty hunter who's determined to bring her to justice. He wrestles her into the car and takes her back to his office. Preston has caught up to Kirsten, a total hottie with a price on her head.
title: Bounty Hunters
